attributes.action: revoke the idiotic decision to axe Great Food Live
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Great food live is the best food educational programme on TV the government is keen to jump on the Bandwaggon as regards healthy food in schools & a general healthier lifestyle this programme does more than any other to promote healthy living & support for local farmers  & small Businesses KEEP GREAT FOOD LIVE

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
